name: MFellows Holdings Limited
description: Developer of a mobile-based financial platform designed to assist individuals to access interest-free credit and better-saving achievements. The company's platform lets users save together with friends and family by creating a circle and validating it within minutes and letting them choose how much to lend based on trustworthiness, enabling individuals to contribute money to a common fund and take turns withdrawing the total amount.
one_liner: Developer of a mobile-based financial platform designed to assist individuals to access interest-free credit and better-saving achievements. The company's platform lets users save together with friends and family by creating a circle and validating it within minutes and letting them choose how much to lend based on trustworthiness, enabling individuals to contribute money to a common fund and take turns withdrawing the total amount.
